Name: Whimsy
About the game: Whimsy is the story of a girl who has always lived in the forest. One morning she awakes to find little red footprints outside her door. As any fearless protagonist would, she follows them. They lead her through the forest where she meets new woodland friends (and foes) while solving charming puzzles. my name is madison karrh and i made this lil macabre game. thank you for playing something another human made. Features: interesting forest creatures puzzles on puzzles on puzzles sweet tiny tunes crafted for you by Diamond Anaya
